ingredients.ingredient: 2 cups self-rising flour, plus more for kneading
7 tablespoons very cold butter, cut into pieces
¾ cup buttermilk, plus additional for brushing
½ cup shredded Irish Cheddar cheese, divided, plus more for topping
¼ cup sliced green onions, divided

cookingTips: Keep butter very cold and cut it into flour quickly to create a crumbly texture for flaky layers
Fold cheese and green onions gently into the dough to avoid overworking
Brush biscuit tops with buttermilk and extra cheese before baking for a golden, cheesy crust
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Help the user understand the importance of cold butter and minimal mixing for light, flaky biscuits and teach proper folding technique for mix-ins.
